column4: Can someone help me i got problem when i downloaded ubuntu 8.10
best to just ask the channel your question.  If someone knows the answer, they will try to answer you
well at this point, I think it would be prudent for you to backup your files first.  Use a livecd.  Or do you already have backups?
I think this will do in the beginning. Anyways, You know a ebook I could continue with once I readed this so I can learn more?
theer's not much more you need unless you want to start getting into more advanced stuff
Does help.ubuntu.com cover the terminal part aswell?
what do you want to accomplish?
I think there was something like cd..
cd ..   goes to the parent directory, which happens to be the same in the scenario you proposed, but it's not what you asked
